Sentencas: A hybrid system consisting of a solid oxide fuel cell, a semiconductor thermoelectric generator and a regenerator is put forward.
Titulo: Performance and Evaluation of a Fuel Cell-Thermoelectric Generator Hybrid System

Sentencas: Expressions for the efficiencies and power outputs of the fuel cell, thermoelectric generator and hybrid system are derived.
Titulo: Performance and Evaluation of a Fuel Cell-Thermoelectric Generator Hybrid System

Sentencas: The relation between the electric currents in the fuel cell and thermoelectric generator is revealed.
Titulo: Performance and Evaluation of a Fuel Cell-Thermoelectric Generator Hybrid System

Sentencas: The maximum efficiency and power output of the hybrid system are calculated numerically.
Titulo: Performance and Evaluation of a Fuel Cell-Thermoelectric Generator Hybrid System

Sentencas: The optimally operating electric currents in the fuel cell and thermoelectric generator are calculated and consequently the optimal region of the hybrid system is determined.
Titulo: Performance and Evaluation of a Fuel Cell-Thermoelectric Generator Hybrid System

Sentencas: The results obtained here will provide some guidance for further understanding the performance and operation of practical fuel cell-thermoelectric generator hybrid systems.
Titulo: Performance and Evaluation of a Fuel Cell-Thermoelectric Generator Hybrid System
